name: Soccer Kids Alpha
description:
A game about soccer, made by people who suck at playing soccer.


Soccer Kids is a tactical, turn-based sports game where you control a teenage mathematical savant, guiding his friends on a quest to win the local street soccer tournament.

The game is set in Poland in the 90s - a period where the country transitioned from a socialist republic to a democracy with a free market. It focuses on the latchkey kids of this period, who fell in love with the new cultural influence from around the world.

Check out the game for free in its early stages and share your feedback with us, we'd love to hear it!

The current version of the game features:

  • Tight, grid-less tactical action. No match is ever the same!
  • Play the tutorial, or
  • Against a AI opponent, or
  • Against your friends in a local hot seat match, or
  • Online through the magic of Remote Play Together!

This is a early, alpha version of Soccer Kids - all content is subject to change.
